thread.title: This is a 'dark time': Community reacts to Canadian junior hockey team bus crash

title: This is a 'dark time': Community reacts to Canadian junior hockey team bus crash
text:
This is a 'dark time': Community reacts to Canadian junior hockey team bus crash Saturday, April 07, 2018 - 00:59 
The local community came together after fourteen people were killed when a bus carrying a Canadian junior hockey team collided with a truck Friday evening in Saskatchewan province, sending shock waves across the hockey-crazy nation. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
The local community came together after fourteen people were killed when a bus carrying a Canadian junior hockey team collided with a truck Friday evening in Saskatchewan province, sending shock waves across the hockey-crazy nation. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2HlcFcg
